name: Thaidigsmann.brussels
goal:
Europaweite Presse- und Kommunikationsberatung, politische Recherche, Beratung in europapolitischen Themen

European media and communications consultancy providing advice and support to organisations and individuals, including in European public affairs
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks

Digital Economy & Internet (GDPR, E-Privacy Directive, Copyright laws, EU measures against hate speech, etc.)

Brexit
